summary: Bullied and diminished by his fellow employees, demure and bashful Ryoichi Suzuki finds support in an unusual friendship with a turtle. Together they will share many adventures and finally conquer the world.
cast: Kumiko Asô|Motoki Fukami|Suidôbashi Hakase|Hiroki Hasegawa|Aki Hiraoka|Gen Hoshino|Inuko Inuyama|Izumi|Megumi Kagurazaka|Erina Mano|Miyuki Matsuda|Miyu Matsushita|Shinji Miyadai|Kenichirô Mogi|Ayaka Morita|Shôko Nakagawa|Kazuki Namioka|Toshiyuki Nishida|Ichirô Ogura|Eita Okuno|Alex Paille|Kiyohiko Shibukawa|Makita Sports|Daikichi Sugawara|Hiroshi Suzuki|Sôichirô Tahara|Hiroko Terada|Tôru Tezuka|Daisuke Tsuda|Ikue Ôtani
title: Rabu & Pîsu
